populateFieldMap

protected void populateFieldMap(MandatoryFieldsCommand command,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,InputFieldGroup> map,
                                TreeNode node)
Populates the fields, the key of the map will be qualified name of the parent. Display name of the field will be display name of the node. In case if the node does not have a display name, the display name of the parent will be used instead.
